name: Bloodworm
description: Deep within the gruesome flesh, there is a hellish beast that can no longer rest. Blood and gore is where it thrives, and where little children go to die. But within the bowels of these here depths, a lone child lays there and rest. Will she live or will she die, that is up for you to decide. Maybe fate will play a cruel twist, in the tangle of flesh of the Bloodworms Abyss.
